transcripts: Pick up some milk and eggs on the way home from work today.
The server migration is scheduled for 2 AM on Saturday to minimize downtime.
Call the dentist to reschedule my appointment for next Tuesday afternoon.
Submit the quarterly expense report by Friday afternoon at the latest.
Remind me to check the oven in twenty minutes.
The weather today is surprisingly warm for December.
Met a guy named Dave at the conference who works on distributed systems.
Let's book the flight for the offsite on Jan 15th.
The logs show a sudden spike in latency every time the database backup starts.
Buy tickets for the concert tomorrow at 10am.
